mapper.select: SELECT iuser, upw, role FROM t_user WHERE email= #{email}

SELECT 0 AS checkShop, a.ishop, c.name, a.name AS shopName, a.location, a.x, a.y, a.tel, a.confirm, b.pic, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_shop a LEFT JOIN t_shop_pic b ON a.ishop= b.ishop LEFT JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser=c.iuser
WHERE a.name LIKE `%${search}%`
GROUP BY a.ishop union SELECT 1 AS checkShop, a.ibutcher, c.name, a.name AS shopName, a.location, a.x, a.y, a.tel, a.confirm, b.pic, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_butcher_shop a LEFT JOIN t_butcher_pic b ON a.ibutcher= b.ibutcher LEFT JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser= c.iuser
WHERE a.name LIKE `%${search}%`
GROUP BY a.ibutcher ORDER BY createdAt LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}

SELECT a.i${column1} AS pk, a.${column2} AS contents, b.nickname as writerNm, a.count FROM t_${table} a JOIN t_user b ON a.iuser=b.iuser WHERE a.COUNT>=1 ORDER BY a.created_at LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}
